p: Coot Bay virus in the Almendravirus genus belongs to the Rhabdoviridae family in Mononegavirales order [ 40]. CBV was isolated from An. quadrimaculatus mosquitoes collected in 2013 in Florida, USA [ 40]. CBV could be cultured in Aedes C6/36 cells, but not in mammalian BHK-21 and Vero cells [ 40]. CBV does not cause apparent illness or deaths in suckling mice. The virion has a diameter of about 50 nm [ 40].
